name: Visionary
tagline: AI-driven learning and productivity web experience
description: Visionary is a web app experience built around an AI-assisted workflow. I focused on the front end and JavaScript logic, implementing interactive UI behavior and client-side functionality to support the core user flows.
impact: Built front-end features and client-side logic for key user flows
Improved UX responsiveness through interactive UI behavior
Shipped a demo-ready product showcase video

name: Rep Track
tagline: Real-time gym rep counter with live dashboard
description: A real-time gym rep counter that streams motion sensor data into a live dashboard. The system integrates low-latency sensor ingestion with a WebSocket pipeline and a responsive web UI for session tracking.
impact: Integrated accelerometer and gyroscope streams for low-latency rep counting
Built a WebSocket pipeline to power a live dashboard with session metrics
Enabled real-time visualization of counts, timers, and workout tracking

name: MarketMeet
tagline: CS + Finance stock selection to match benchmark returns
description: A Waterloo CS + Finance project that programmatically selects equities to match benchmark market returns. It ingests TA-provided tickers, downloads historical pricing data, computes returns and risk metrics, scores candidates, and optimizes portfolio weights under real constraints.
impact: Built an end-to-end pipeline: ticker cleaning, downloads, returns, and screening
Asynchronously fetched metadata (sector, market cap, earnings) to enrich selection constraints
Optimized weights to minimize tracking error while respecting sector and cap constraints

name: BetterBuy
tagline: Finalist mobile app for sustainable purchasing decisions
description: A mobile app built for the SMAC AI App Competition that helps users make more sustainable purchases using barcode, photo, or text inputs and AI-assisted scoring. Includes user preference storage and caching for fast reuse of prior scans.
impact: Finalist in a nationwide AI app competition
Implemented multi-input flows (barcode, photo, text) to score products
Added persistent caching and customization for a smoother UX
